mapper.select: SELECT cpt.CFMANUFACTUREORDER AS "manufactureOrder", cpt.CFTASKID AS "taskId", cpt.CFOPERATIONNAME AS "operationName", cpt.CFSTATUS AS "status", cpt.CFOPERATIONNO AS "operationNo", cptask.CFWORKPERSONID AS "workPersonId", tbp.FNAME_L2 AS "workPersonName", cpt.CFOLDBEGINTIME AS "startTime", cpt.CFOLDENDTIME AS "endTime" FROM CT_PRE_TASKBMO cpt INNER JOIN CT_PRJ_TASK cptask ON cptask.FID = cpt.CFTASKID INNER JOIN T_BD_PERSON tbp ON tbp.FID = cptask.cfworkpersonid WHERE cpt.CFManufactureOrder = #{manufactureId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
